tasks.label: Update-AzAutoFWProject
tasks.detail: Invoke Azure Automation Framework update script
tasks.command: command -v pwsh >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo 'PowerShell (pwsh) could not be found. Please install PowerShell or check your PATH.'; exit 1; }; pwsh -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -NoLogo -NonInteractive -File scripts/AzAutoFWProject/Update-AzAutoFWProject.ps1 -VsCodeTask

windows.command: where pwsh.exe >nul 2>&1 && (pwsh.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -NoLogo -NonInteractive -File ./scripts/AzAutoFWProject/Update-AzAutoFWProject.ps1 -VsCodeTask) || where powershell.exe >nul 2>&1 && (powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -NoLogo -NonInteractive -File ./scripts/AzAutoFWProject/Update-AzAutoFWProject.ps1 -VsCodeTask) || echo 'Neither PowerShell Core (pwsh.exe) nor Windows PowerShell (powershell.exe) could be found. Please install PowerShell or check your PATH.'
